Large great room with enough space for entertainment and an eating area. Upgraded kitchen with granite counters, gas cooking, and dishwasher. title: Gorgeous One Bedroom in Historic Olde City
description:
Enjoy living in Olde City Place!!
This ultra-quiet, unique 5th-floor, one-bedroom apartment has many stunning features that will make this home a true haven. The spacious & airy living room & dining area boasts brick walls, bamboo flooring, high ceilings, recessed lighting, a skylight, and a wood-burning fireplace. Central air and heating, and a washer & ventless dryer in the unit are included.
The beautiful kitchen features stainless steel appliances, limestone flooring, a garbage disposer, and plenty of cabinet space.
The bedroom that can easily fit a king-sized bed, has an organized closet, an extra wardrobe unit, and bamboo flooring.
The bathroom has high ceilings, dark custom cabinetry, granite counters, a granite window sill, limestone mosaic tile floor, and shower walls. Comforting heat from the ceiling exhaust fan warms you as you exit the tub/shower on those chilly days.
This safe and secure 40-unit building with an elevator, has security cameras on each floor, two separate entrances to the building with a key fob system, and a front door camera.
Available June 1. Please email with any questions or to schedule a showing.

title: Incredible South Philly 1Br/1Ba w/giant backyard - 6/1 or earlier
description: Gorgeously Large 1br condo for rent in between East Passyunk and Point Breeze. This apartment has truly been an oasis during the pandemic, thanks to high ceilings, beautiful sunlight, and the bedroom facing the very larger shared yard at the back of the building. Quiet despite being on Broad Street. This unit is in a traditional brown stone building, converted into 7 private residences. The kitchen features granite counter tops and new stainless steal appliances: refrigerator, full size gas stove (5 burners), and dishwasher. Radiated heat with tenant-controlled thermostat, ceiling fans in bedroom and living room, with possibility to buy existing 2 window AC units from current tenant. Lots of closet space in the unit, and an extra private/locked storage unit in the basement. Neighbors are friendly, respectful, quiet, and helpful. Located two blocks from the Ellsworth/Federal Broad Street Line, and surprisingly easy parking right in front of the building or within a 1 block radius. Walking distance to shopping at Broad & Washington (Target, Sprouts, Pet Smart, and soon Giant) and Passyunk Square. Tons of restaurants, parks and shopping and nightlife around, and easy to catch the Broad Street Run, Mummers Parade, and games at the sports complex. This has been an incredible home, and will go fast!

title: Beautiful One Bedroom
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Each thoughtfully designed unit includes kitchens
description:
Broadridge is an unrivaled community filled with sculptural, modern elements and endless amenities that deliver an unparalleled living experience. Each thoughtfully designed unit includes kitchens with custom-crafted cabinetry, bathrooms with novel design elements, and open floorplans for the modern connoisseur. Located in one of Philadelphia's most vibrant neighborhoods, Broadridge brings the best of an urban community together with a luxurious place to call home. Here, access to spaces designed for coworking, lounging, and fitness are complemented by unique features like a personal theater, expansive pool and deck, pet spa, and state-of-the-art demonstration kitchen. Steps outside Broadridge you'll find an energetic neighborhood that boasts diverse treasures like Umai Umai and La Calaca Feliz and local favorites like Fairmount Farmer's Market and Bad Brother. These reside in between rich cultural attractions like the Met and the Philadelphia Museum of Art. Unit Amenities include custom-crafted light-oak grain and navy cabinetry, Euro-styled stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher and microwave, nine-foot ceilings, sweeping city views in most residences, and your own washer and dryer. title: Splendid Artist Loft with Common Outdoor Space - NO LIBS
description:
Available early July:
Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #PH07! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School in the Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. Unit #PH07 is a lofted 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment on the top floor of the building. Enter into a hallway that opens into the common area with high ceilings, large windows, hardwood floors, and plenty of space for different living room and dining room layouts. The kitchen is in the center and boasts ample cabinet & prep space, built-in microwave, gas range, and fridge. Directly behind the kitchen is your full bathroom offering tile flooring, a vanity, and a shower / tub combo. Continue past the bathroom to a bonus area which would work well as an office space, den, or workout area. The lofted bedroom is carpeted and has a double-door closet. The building also features a brand new elevator and there are FREE laundry rooms on the 1st floor, 2nd floor, and Penthouse floor. Schedule your tour today!

title: 3118 Richmond St #5
description:
This 3 Bedroom 2 Bathroom unit is a part of a significant renovation project in one of Philadelphia's most established neighborhoods, Port Richmond. This apartment is positioned in a building with 7 total apartments, from 1 bed to 3 beds each, and is anchored by ReAnimator Coffee Shop, a locally owned and operated coffee shop on the first floor. The amenities for the building include high ceilings, a focus on natural light, exposed brick, sustainable bamboo hardwood flooring, granite countertops, ceramic tile bathrooms, 4 appliance kitchen, garbage disposal, washer/dryer in unit. In one of the main hallways and one of the units is a 100+ year old ghost sign that was uncovered by the builder during renovation. This large building has two separate and secure entrances, and also has a centrally located light-well to allow for additional light into the units. You will be in control of the main door via a tenant directory at your main entrance. We welcome your visit today!
Lease Terms: Three months rent to move-in $4,770 Total monthly income must equal three times the monthly rent $4,770. Pets are allowed. $250 non refundable pet deposit. $25 for monthly pet rent. $50 application fee per applicant payable to Keller Williams Philadelphia. Tenants are responsible for PGW and PECO. Landlord pays water. To schedule a showing contact Shirlene Goff. Email is best. shirlene @thesomersteam.com
